item.description:
Greetings to all the incubators old and new!

Awesome Holiday themed performance by my troupe Rebels Without Applauze this Thursday at Somerville Theater in Davis Square at 8:30pm!  Best of all it's only $5!!

 

So come on out and get there early at 8pm and we'll meet in the Museum of Bad Art which is part of the theater. We'll do some fun warm-up games and some quick scene work before settling in for the show.

 

 Hope to see you Thursday.

Any questions or concerns let me know!

Cheers! 

Peace, prosperity, and happiness,

Jason J.
item.how_to_find_us: In the backroom stirring up some laughter and ruckus!!
item.why: some of us who have been incubators for a short time and a long time are performing.
item.name: This week!! Incubator and Show at Somerville Theater!!
